# namespace

## Summary

Provides an unambiguous mechanism for conveying a URI fragment portion of an ElementID.


## Description

A namespace provides an unambiguous mechanism for conveying a URI fragment portion of an ElementID.

    - name: namespace
    - Nature: DataProperty
    - Range: xsd:anyURI
